title: Mlinear: Rethink the Linear Model for Time-series Forecasting. (arXiv:2305.04800v2 [cs.LG] UPDATED)
abstract: Recently, significant advancements have been made in time-series forecasting research, with an increasing focus on analyzing the nature of time-series data, e.g, channel-independence (CI) and channel-dependence (CD), rather than solely focusing on designing sophisticated forecasting models. However, current research has primarily focused on either CI or CD in isolation, and the challenge of effectively combining these two opposing properties to achieve a synergistic effect remains an unresolved issue.
